{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=AR-7284Wn |revision=A (B) |asin= |est_release_date=08/2010 |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8672 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205DM2I-12G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-6T |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8191RU |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306G |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 }} {{TagLine|150Mbps Wireless ADSL2/2+ Modem Router}} :[https://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/adsl_modem_routers_n150_wi-fi/ar-7284wna/ Product page]
This entry can probably also apply to the '''AR-7284WnB'''.
4MB NOR Flash, 16MB SDRAM per the [[Edimax]] datasheet. :The default SSID may be '''edimax'''.
